row.Docu: It writes the specified information into specified file on the Agent OS. Moreover it also sets a return code which can be used to validate whether file contents has been written successfully or not.

row.process: ! WRITE FILE AT SPECIFIED FILE PATH : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_CF_FILECONTENTS#) : IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
